mnd7:2.5: We will train ourselves in seclusion.
mnd7:3.1: Yoking one self to being sexually minded.
mnd7:3.2: Sexual intercourse is called whatever meeting of two people which is a false doctrine, vulgar, lowly, coarse, dirty, secretive.
mnd7:3.3: What is said to be the cause of sexual intercourse?
mnd7:3.5: that from which there is conflict is called sexual intercourse.
